name: testing
description: Comprehensive testing with unit, integration, and e2e agents

agents.name: unit-tests
agents.role: Unit tests for individual functions, classes, and modules

agents.name: integration-tests
agents.role: Integration tests for API endpoints, service interactions, database queries

agents.name: e2e-tests
agents.role: End-to-end tests for user flows, UI interactions, cross-service scenarios
